title: Farmer Charley
brief_description: One of the cartoon series featuring the character “Charley”. In this film Charley is willed a half-interest in a farm and has rosy dreams of rustic bliss, but the reality shows him that a farmer’s life requires expert knowledge and scientific skill - as well as good hard work.
